title: AAR womens Pleated
features: ✅ HIGH QUALITY MATERIAL: AAR Kilts are made by Light Weight Durable 100% Acrylic which provides customers with a soft and comfortable experience without the itchiness.
✅ AVAILABLE COLOR AND SIZES: Currently available in Royal Stewart, Irish Heritage, Black Watch and Plain Black. Available Sizes are US 8 – US 24.
✅ SIZE GUIDE: Please buy your usual US size. For further information please see our size chart image.
✅ CLOSURE SYSTEM: Velcro closure. Rust free double buckle and black leather straps with pleated detailing make the kilt easily adjustable for a comfort fit.

✅ WASHING INSTRUCTION: The premium quality, Kilts are Machine washable. Do not bleach; It is recommendable to be washed in warm water as it becomes ultra-soft right after being washed. Do not spin dry. Warm iron under damp cloth to avoid shine. 30 Degree
description: AAR Brand New Black Watch Women’s Billie Kilt Skirt 2 Buckles & 2 Leather Straps. It is a Perfect Combination of Classic Features and Fashionable Modern Design. Acrylic High Quality Wool in 16 Inches Kilt Length. Machine washable at 40°. Women’s Billie Kilt Skirt available in Black Watch, Royal Stewart and Irish Heritage and Available in 28,30, 32, 34, 36, 38, 40, 42, 44 Inches Waist Size. Customer satisfaction Guarantee.
